name: ANOVEX
description: Anovex is a privacy-focused decentralized trading layer built on Solana. It enables users to execute swaps anonymously using encrypted routing, a dual-wallet architecture, and deposit relays that break the on-chain transaction graph. Unlike typical DEX activity, trades performed through Anovex cannot be linked to a userâ€™s public wallet. The protocol integrates with major Solana liquidity sources while maintaining complete unlinkability, allowing users to trade any SPL token through private settlement. Anovex also provides a public explorer that verifies transaction outcomes without exposing user identity or trading patterns.
